original_text: Now there came a traveler to the rich man, and he was unwilling to take one of his own flock or herd to prepare for the guest who had come to him, but he took the poor man's lamb and prepared it for the man who had come to him.”
korean_text: 어떤 행인이 그 부자에게 오매 부자가 자기에게 온 행인을 위하여 자기의 양과 소를 아껴 잡지 아니하고 가난한 사람의 양 새끼를 빼앗아다가 자기에게 온 사람을 위하여 잡았나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: and he was unwilling to take
one of his own flock or herd
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 양이나 소 떼 중 하나를

sentences.original_text: but he took the poor man's lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 가난한 사람의 어린 양을 가져가서

sentences.original_text: and prepared it for the man
